snippet: The man, whom Belgian and Moroccan news sources identified as Gelel Attar, is of Belgian and Moroccan background, as were most of those who participated in the attacks.
abstract: Moroccan officials say they have detained Gelel Attar, Belgian man who is suspected of being close friend of one of leaders of November 2015 Paris terrorist attacks.
lead_paragraph: The man, whom Belgian and Moroccan news sources identified as Gelel Attar, is of Belgian and Moroccan background, as were most of those who participated in the attacks.

headline.main: Morocco: Belgian Linked to Leader of the Paris Attacks Is Arrested
headline.print_headline: Africa; Morocco: Belgian Linked to Leader of the Paris Attacks Is Arrested
